sentences.en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentences.cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentences.en: Can you mail it to me as an attachment? ＃
sentences.cn: 你能把它作为附件发给我吗？

sentences.en: Direct mail advertising is of course a huge business.
sentences.cn: 直接邮寄广告当然是一笔巨大的生意。

sentences.en: Do you want to send an E-mail?
sentences.cn: 你想发电子邮件吗？

sentences.en: Goods may be sent by surface mail or airmail.
sentences.cn: 货物可通过平寄或空运发送。

sentences.en: Grey-market perfumes and toiletries are now commonly sold by mail.
sentences.cn: 水货香水和化妆品现在常常通过邮购方式售卖。

sentences.en: He asked his mother to send it by registered mail.
sentences.cn: 他让他妈妈用挂号邮件寄。

sentences.en: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.cn: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.en: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.cn: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.en: He'd left me to pack up the mail and post it off.
sentences.cn: 他让我整理并投递邮件。

sentences.en: If you have any problems then send me some mail.
sentences.cn: 如有任何疑问，就给我发邮件。

sentences.en: It is possible to attach executable program files to e-mail.
sentences.cn: 可以在电子邮件里附上可执行程序文件。

sentences.en: No, I could mail it to you.
sentences.cn: 一点也不迟，我可以邮寄给你。

sentences.en: People had to renew their motor vehicle registrations through the mail.
sentences.cn: 人们必须以书信方式重新登记机动车辆。

sentences.en: Peter starts looking through the mail as soon as the door shuts.
sentences.cn: 彼得一关上门就开始逐一查看起邮件来。

sentences.en: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.cn: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.en: Some mail servers appear to be open relays.
sentences.cn: 有些邮件服务器似乎是开放中继。

sentences.en: The Daily Mail has the headline "The Voice of Conscience"
sentences.cn: 《每日邮报》的头版标题为“良知的声音”。

sentences.en: The post office got behind in delivering Christmas mail.
sentences.cn: 邮局没有及时发送圣诞节邮件。

sentences.en: The toys are available by mail order from Opi Toys.
sentences.cn: 这些玩具可以从Opi玩具公司邮购。

sentences.en: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.cn: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

sentences.en: They send the mail by road.
sentences.cn: 他们通过公路运送邮件。

sentences.en: You can contact us by e-mail.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过电子邮件和我们联系。

sentences.en: You shouldn’t read other people’s mail.
sentences.cn: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.en: Your check is in the mail.
sentences.cn: 您的支票正在邮递中。

words.tran_cn: 装甲的；披甲的；有锁子甲状鳞的
邮寄者；邮船；邮寄的广告；邮件收发机
邮寄；邮件；（苏格兰）农场租金
邮寄；使披上铠甲的（mail的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 航空邮件；航空邮政
邮寄；通过写信，通过邮递；按信件
每日邮报（英国伦敦的报刊）
n. 直接邮件；直接邮寄广告
n. （美）垃圾邮件；邮寄宣传品
电子邮件系统；信件系统
优先邮件（美国邮政的邮件类型之一，在邮件分检系统内享有优先处理的特权）

trans.tran_cn: 邮件，邮政，邮政（制度），〈古〉袋，旅行包
trans.tran_en: the letters and packages that are delivered to you
to send a letter or package to someone
to send a letter or package to someone
